'''House Trant '''is a vassal house from [[the Stormlands]] that holds fealty to [[House Baratheon]].
sections.In the books:
[[File:Meryn-Trant-201.jpg|200px|right|thumb|Ser Meryn Trant, a member of House Trant.]]
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Trant is a vassal house sworn to [[Storm's End]]. Their seat is Gallowsgrey and their sigil is a hanged man, sable, on a field of blue.
